EmailTemplate.description: Follow up email to request client to send in the signed agreement
EmailTemplate.name: Opp - Offer Accepted
EmailTemplate.subject: Action Required - Don't Miss Your Chance For Funding
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I’d like to get you your funds as soon as possible – but you haven’t sent me the signed agreement we discussed.
As soon as you do, I can send it to our underwriting team to finish processing your request.
Call me today at {!User.Phone} if you have any questions. I’m looking forward to helping your business grow.
Sincerely, {!User.Name}
